definition: Zhu Hongdeng, one of the leaders of the Boxer Rebellion

sentences.english: Soft rain is knocking at the red window.
The scarlet cord was a sign to the spies she wanted to be rescued by them.
sentences.chinese: 朱红线绳是给探子们的暗号，告诉他们她想获救。

sentences.english: Velvet black shadows emphasize their brilliance, while the depths of the canyon are flooded by an ocean of vermilion dusk.
sentences.chinese: 而大峡谷的深处正沐浴在一派朱红的暮色苍茫中。

sentences.english: When I looked out of the window again, he was walking back towards me with oranges in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 我再向外看时，他已抱了朱红的橘子往回走了。

sentences.english: Will it end or begin in your cinnabar juice?
sentences.chinese: 要在你的朱红色的果汁里结束还是开始？

sentences.english: Drama has become the most radiant part of her life.
sentences.chinese: 戏剧已经成为吴朱红生活中最闪亮的部分。

sentences.english: To purify the house he is to take two birds and some cedar wood, scarlet yarn and hyssop.
sentences.chinese: 要为洁净房子取两只鸟和香柏木，朱红色线并牛膝草。

sentences.english: So she sent them away and they departed. And she tied the scarlet cord in the window.
sentences.chinese: 于是打发他们去了，又把朱红线绳系在窗户上。

sentences.english: They stripped him and put a scarlet robe on him
sentences.chinese: 他们给他脱了衣服，穿上一件朱红色袍子。

sentences.english: And he shall take to cleanse the house two birds, and cedar wood, and scarlet, and hyssop.
sentences.chinese: 要为洁净房子取两只鸟和香柏木，朱红色线并牛膝草。

sentences.english: Club, the overall design is given priority to with gold and red color.
sentences.chinese: 整体会所设计颜色以金黄色和朱红色为主。

sentences.english: Anthraquinone derivatives were previously isolated from the fungus Dermocybe sanguinea .
sentences.chinese: 蒽醌衍生物原先孤立于真菌朱红丝膜菌血红。

sentences.english: Rain drops slightly flick, on the window vermilion- like.
And they stripped him, and put on him a scarlet robe.
sentences.chinese: 他们给他脱了衣服，穿上一件朱红色袍子。

sentences.english: The scarlet would pass away from his lips.
sentences.chinese: 朱红会从他的唇上消褪。

sentences.english: The yurikamome gull has a vermilion bill and legs.
sentences.chinese: 赤色鸥有朱红色的细嘴和双腿。

definition: variant of 斑駁|斑驳[ban1 bo2]
black (without gloss)/black with a hint of red in it
